content: Lollipop JSON is overall a dictionary. There are 2 top level nodes, "elements" and "workflows". "elements" can have 1 - many children, where each child represents an element. Some possible elements include Text, and Button. I will teach you exactly how to represent an element. The other top level node other than "elements" is "workflows". Each child of "workflows" represents a single workflow, and describes some kind of trigger and action taken. I will also teach you exactly how to represent a workflow.
